title: Harlow infant monkeys preferred cloth mother

content.question: A researcher found that when infant monkeys were startled or frightened, they preferred a cloth surrogate mother over a wire mother who had food. The baby monkeysâ€™ response indicated which of the following?

choices.label: The amygdala develops earlier in monkeys than in humans.
Contact comfort was more important to them than food.
Monkeys do not develop normally with artificial food sources.
Being raised with a terry cloth mother leads to an insecure attachment style.

content.answer: Contact comfort was more important to them than food.
